tool.name: Select taxa

param.name: cladeagenomes
param.label: Choose Genomes in Taxon A
param.help: Select between two and fifteen (related) genomes for Taxon A only. (You can select genomes for Taxon B on the next screen.)

param.name: cladebgenomes
param.label: Choose Genomes in Taxon B
param.help: Select between two and fifteen different genomes for Taxon B.

tool.help:
This tool allows you to select genomes for both Taxon A and Taxon B in successive screens.
No fewer than two and no more than fifteen genomes may be selected for either clade.
